Posts.Content: thanks FLmlp for the advice on the turkey tail mushroom, ordered some liquid extract and caps, and read some articles on it,
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed with questions about nutrition

Posts.Content: Hello folks I'm new to the forum and newly diagnosed with prostate cancer, I'm 62 and had a pretty bad prostate infection, for which i went to the local clinic, first PSA was 24 was referred to Urologist, biopsies showed all cores with cancer cells, Gleason score 4+4=8, last PSA fpsa 4.6 and tpsa 30.6, "if i understood the nurse correctly" just did a bone scan but don't have results yet, I've purchased a book on nutrition for prostate cancer, so now I'm drinking 2 soy protein shakes a day "about 90 gm" with vitamins, lycopene, longevinex and peterapure "resveratrol", vitamine E 400, n-acetyl cystene, and tomato juice daily, anyone having any advice or thoughts on nutrition would be greatly appreciated. thanks
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed with questions about nutrition

Posts.Content: Hello folks I'm new to the forum and newly diagnosed with prostate cancer, I'm 62 and had a pretty bad prostate infection, for which i went to the local clinic, first PSA was 24 was referred to Urologist, biopsies showed all cores with cancer cells, Gleason score 4+4=8, last PSA fpsa 4.6 and tpsa 30.6, "if i understood the nurse correctly" just did a bone scan but don't have results yet, I've purchased a book on nutrition for prostate cancer, so now I'm drinking 2 soy protein shakes a day "about 90 gm" with vitamins, lycopene, longevinex and peterapure "resveratrol", vitamine E 400, n-acetyl cystene, and tomato juice daily, anyone having any advice or thoughts on nutrition would be greatly appreciated. thanks
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed with questions about nutrition

Posts.Content: thanks folks I appreciate your responses and yup, I'm moving on with what ever treatment my urologist recommends, im not a candidate for brachytherapy, and we havnt decided on a treatment regime yet but discussed chemical intervention and robotic surgery, thanks again for your responses,
